products.product: COSRX Snail Mucin Repairing Serum 100ml, Hydrating

sample_reviews.text:
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Hydration-Focused Essence Supporting Skin Barrier and TextureSkin type: Normal to dry, sensitivePrimary concerns: Dehydration, dullness, compromised skin barrierUsage:This product was used consistently for several weeks as part of a daily skincare routine. It was applied once to twice daily after cleansing and before moisturizer. No additional hydrating essences or treatments were introduced during the evaluation period.Formulation & texture:The essence has a lightweight, viscous texture that spreads easily and absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky residue. Once absorbed, it leaves the skin feeling smooth and lightly cushioned. The formula is fragrance-free and did not cause irritation.Observed effects:With regular use, skin felt more hydrated, calmer, and more balanced. Areas prone to dryness appeared smoother, and overall skin texture looked more even. Improvements were gradual and cumulative, consistent with a barrier-supporting hydration product rather than an immediate corrective treatment.Strengths:‚Ä¢ Provides sustained hydration‚Ä¢ Supports skin barrier function‚Ä¢ Lightweight and non-greasy‚Ä¢ Suitable for sensitive skin‚Ä¢ Layers well with serums and moisturizersConsiderations:‚Ä¢ Texture may feel unusual initially for those new to essences‚Ä¢ Very dry skin may require an additional occlusive moisturizerAssessment:This is a well-formulated hydrating essence designed to support moisture retention and skin comfort. It performs reliably with consistent use and integrates easily into both simple and multi-step skincare routines.‚≠ê Rating: 5 out of 5 stars

I really love this products and keep buying it all over again. I am on my 7th bottle. I have really dry skin (flakes since the weather and treatment), so the stickiness and hydrating really help my skin conditions and repair skin barrker. I have inflamtion pimple and while using it, the inflamation did go better.The feeling lingers on the skin for a very long time. After roughly 30 mins applying this products (when the linger feeling leaves), it leaves my skin a thin layer of filter (oil, i believe, from neither my skin or the product), which is glowing and really helps since my skin really need the hydration and that thin layer of oil to prevent water loss. It softens my skin. I used 3 pumps after cleansing. If you have try skin, i believe it worth. If you have oil or combination, adjust the using amount in order to prevent clog pore.
